channel.title: Posts on A Gopher's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Gopher's Site

item.title: Quick Sort
item.description: package sort // Quick sorts nums from index l to r func Quick(nums []int, l, r int) { if l >= r { return } p := partition(nums, l, r) quickSort(nums, l, p-1) quickSort(nums, p+1, r) } // partition puts nums[hi] to its right place and return the index of it func partition(nums []int, lo, hi int) int { i := lo - 1 for j := lo; j < hi; j++ { if nums[j] < nums[hi] { i++ nums[i], nums[j] = nums[j], nums[i] } } nums[i+1], nums[hi] = nums[hi], nums[i+1] return i + 1 }

item.title: Introduce A Simple File Server
item.description: Install $ go get -u github.com/li-go/goserve Usage $ goserve -h Usage of goserve: -dir string directory to host (default ".") -disable-cache disable http cache -port int port to host (default 3000)
